mapper.sql: SELECT domain, domain_tree, domain_ip, flag, id, mps_exist, domain_num, is_valid FROM domain_dependence
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO domain_dependence ( domain, domain_tree, domain_ip, flag, mps_exist, domain_num ) VALUES ( #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domainTree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domainIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mpsExist,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{domainNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 1 )
